category-def.name: base
category-def.label: NeoEMF
category-def.description: NeoEMF base components (no implementation provided, see Adapters components to plug a specific datastore)

category-def.name: backend
category-def.label: NeoEMF Adapters
category-def.description: Backend-specific implementations of NeoEMF. Provided components can be plugged separately to store models in a specific manner. See plugins descriptions for usages.
